summary: Comprehensive testing of Ecommify Orders-Ewidencja (sales ledger) integration and Calendar page. All features working correctly. Backend: 28/28 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All tested flows pass. Key changes from previous iteration: Paragony replaced with Ewidencja sprzedazy, Zadania tab replaced with Kalendarz tab, margin calculator removed.
passed_tests: PIN login (2409) via numpad successfully authenticates
Bottom nav shows: Menu, Wyniki, Zamowienia, Kalendarz, AI (NOT Zadania)
Dashboard does NOT have margin calculator tile
Orders page has two tabs: Zamowienia and Ewidencja (NOT Paragony)
Orders tab shows orders list with summary cards
Add order dialog opens and creates orders correctly
Ewidencja tab shows sales records grouped by date with Brutto/VAT/Netto summary
Generate sales records from orders button (Z zamowien) works - toast confirms
Manual sales record entry via Dodaj button in Ewidencja
Daily PDF download (Dzienna) button clickable
Monthly PDF download (Miesieczna) button clickable
Per-day PDF download button works
Shop filtering tabs (WSZYSTKIE, ecom1-4) work correctly
Month navigation (Luty 2026) works
Calendar page shows full month calendar grid
Calendar highlights today
Days with reminders/notes show indicator dots
Click calendar day to select and show reminders/notes for that day
Add reminder dialog with title, date, time, and recurring frequency (none/daily/weekly/monthly)
Add note for selected date works
Recurring frequency dropdown (Jednorazowe/Codziennie/Co tydzien/Co miesiac) works
Delete note works
API: GET /api/sales-records returns records (200 OK)
API: POST /api/sales-records creates manual record (200 OK)
API: POST /api/sales-records/generate-from-orders generates from orders (200 OK)
API: DELETE /api/sales-records/{id} deletes record (200 OK)
API: GET /api/sales-records/pdf/daily returns PDF (200 OK, application/pdf)
API: GET /api/sales-records/pdf/monthly returns PDF (200 OK, application/pdf)
API: GET /api/reminders returns list (200 OK)
API: POST /api/reminders with recurring frequency works (200 OK)
API: PUT /api/reminders/{id} toggle done works (200 OK)
API: DELETE /api/reminders/{id} works (200 OK)
API: GET /api/notes returns list (200 OK)
API: POST /api/notes creates note (200 OK)
API: DELETE /api/notes/{id} works (200 OK)
API: Combined monthly stats works (200 OK)
API: Weekly stats works (200 OK)
seed_data_creation: Created test order (Test Customer Playwright, 299.99 PLN, 2026-02-12) which was auto-converted to sales record
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features implemented and tested: 1) Ewidencja sprzedazy (sales ledger) replaced Paragony with daily/monthly PDF downloads and VAT calculation, 2) Calendar page with reminders (recurring: daily/weekly/monthly) and notes section, 3) Margin calculator removed from Dashboard, 4) Zadania tab replaced with Kalendarz in bottom nav. App is in Polish, currency PLN, VAT 23%. Shopify/TikTok sync endpoints are MOCKED.
